name: Yashraj Sah
position: Product @ Liquiloans | BITS PILANI | Forbes-Unstop Top 30 E-School Leader | Ex-MPL, MissCallPay | President @ 180 DC | Consulting | Product | Startups
about: I am a Product Manager who enjoys connecting the dots: be it ideas from different disciplines, people from different teams, or applications from different industries. I have strong technical skills and an academic background in engineering, statistics, and business analytics. My passion lies in solving users & business problems with tailored data and algorithms and communicating complex ideas to non-technical stakeholders.

current_company.name: LiquiLoans
current_company.title: Product @ Liquiloans | BITS PILANI | Forbes-Unstop Top 30 E-School Leader | Ex-MPL, MissCallPay | President @ 180 DC | Consulting | Product | Startups

experience.title: General Manager - Product
experience.description: • Led 16 API integration of leading LSP of India into the core lending system of Liquiloans, enhancing system interoperability.• Streamlined integration journey & process flows, optimizing the overall partner experience and reducing the time-to-market by 25%.• Developed extensive API documentation and integration guidelines, leading to significant reduction of reliance on technical support . • Scaled the business’s AUM by 15%, contributing significantly to overall company growth and profitability.
experience.description_html: • Led 16 API integration of leading LSP of India into the core lending system of Liquiloans, enhancing system interoperability.• Streamlined integration journey & process flows, optimizing the overall partner experience and reducing the time-to-market by 25%.• Developed extensive API documentation and integration guidelines, leading to significant reduction of reliance on technical support . • Scaled the business’s AUM by 15%, contributing significantly to overall company growth and profitability.

positions.subtitle: MissCallPay
positions.description: Heading Product, Business & Strategic Alliance at MissCallPay.For associations mail me at yashraj.s@misscallpay.com• Executed a on-ground User Research with Microsave Consulting in 23 Tier-2 cities to study the adoption of UPI among merchants. • Shipped the MissCallPay Merchant App along with Development, Design & Product Team.• Strategised a user acquisition plan for first 1000 users in 7 days with data driven client funnel to maximise user growth in 1st year. • Onboarded AXIS Bank, Tata Power, Adani Electricity, IDFC First Bank & Bank of India for MissCallPay UPI Services.
positions.title: Product & Business (Founder's Office)
positions.description_html:
Heading Product, Business & Strategic Alliance at MissCallPay.
For associations mail me at yashraj.s@misscallpay.com

• Executed a on-ground User Research with Microsave Consulting in 23 Tier-2 cities to study the adoption of UPI among merchants.
• Shipped the MissCallPay Merchant App along with Development, Design & Product Team.
• Strategised a user acquisition plan for first 1000 users in 7 days with data driven client funnel to maximise user growth in 1st year.
• Onboarded AXIS Bank, Tata Power, Adani Electricity, IDFC First Bank & Bank of India for MissCallPay UPI Services.

positions.subtitle: 180 Degrees Consulting BITS Goa
positions.description: 180 Degrees Consulting is the world’s largest consultancy for high-growth startups, non-profits, social enterprises, and government organizations. 180 DC BITS Goa chapter provides high-quality consulting services to socially conscious organizations, startups, and government bodies to accelerate their growth and maximize their Impact.Major milestones:• Led the team of 40 consultants to help NGOs, NPOs, Startups & Governments to scale their impact via delivering high-quality consulting projects.• Onboarded 20 clients and completed 25 projects achieving a 3X growth Y-o-Y.• Achieved a growth of 4X on social media outreach with a constant engagement rate of 40% and above.Email at: ysah@180dc.org for associations, projects and queries!
positions.title: President
positions.description_html:
180 Degrees Consulting is the world’s largest consultancy for high-growth startups, non-profits, social enterprises, and government organizations. 180 DC BITS Goa chapter provides high-quality consulting services to socially conscious organizations, startups, and government bodies to accelerate their growth and maximize their Impact.

Major milestones:
• Led the team of 40 consultants to help NGOs, NPOs, Startups & Governments to scale their impact via delivering high-quality consulting projects.
• Onboarded 20 clients and completed 25 projects achieving a 3X growth Y-o-Y.
• Achieved a growth of 4X on social media outreach with a constant engagement rate of 40% and above.

Email at: ysah@180dc.org for associations, projects and queries!

positions.subtitle: 180 Degrees Consulting BITS Goa

Led a team of 10 senior consultants for the project "The Money Club" - An India based SaaS company that provides P2P lending (ROSCA).

positions.subtitle: 180 Degrees Consulting BITS Goa
positions.description: Projects Undertaken:1) Team Leader for the project "Safe Children" - A Denmark based NGO focused on Women Empowerment.Deliverables:- Devised a Go-To-Market Strategy to enter India.- Competitor Analysis across six key factors and Potential Partnerships.- Crafted programs based on Numerical Analysis of region wise crimes against women in India.- Geographical Analysis based on 5 factors to find the optimal city to start the operations.- Financial Modelling covering all the operations of the 1st branch.- Curated a Fundraiser Database to raise ₹ 10 million within a year.2) Lead Business Strategy Consultant for the project "Oribis Expedition" - The UK based Responsible Tourism Company.
positions.title: Senior Consultant
positions.description_html:
Projects Undertaken:
1) Team Leader for the project "Safe Children" - A Denmark based NGO focused on Women Empowerment.
Deliverables:
- Devised a Go-To-Market Strategy to enter India.
- Competitor Analysis across six key factors and Potential Partnerships.
- Crafted programs based on Numerical Analysis of region wise crimes against women in India.

2) Lead Business Strategy Consultant for the project "Oribis Expedition" - The UK based Responsible Tourism Company.

experience.title: International Delegate
experience.description: Harvard Project for Asian and International Relations (HPAIR) is an internationally recognized student-run organization at Harvard University, offering a platform to exchange ideas and discuss the most important economic, political, social, and healthcare issues relevant to the Asia-Pacific region. This year's theme is "Reinventing with Resilience", which is extremely essential in today's world.This year's conference features the greatest speakers in HPAIR's 30-year history — including the CEOs of McKinsey & Company, Bain & Company, Boston Consulting Group (BCG), Infosys, Malaysia Airlines, etc as well as leading government officials and celebrities.
experience.description_html: Harvard Project for Asian and International Relations (HPAIR) is an internationally recognized student-run organization at Harvard University, offering a platform to exchange ideas and discuss the most important economic, political, social, and healthcare issues relevant to the Asia-Pacific region.           -Worked in a diverse team of 5 consultants and 1 engagement manager from London, Manchester, Walldorf, Berlin and Madrid to deliver a consulting project.-The scope of the project was to help a gender-neutral clothing brand based out of Italy to identify their target group, crafting the social media strategy for a strong online presence, strengthening the current value propositions of the products with product diversification strategy to penetrate the existing market, followed by strategies to expand in new market by effective joint venture and partnerships.
